title: Qualifications to understand Bhagavad-gita | Sri Chanchalapathi Dasa
speaker: HG Chanchalapathi Dasa

segments.text: In the fourth chapter, Krishna says,
Arjuna, this is a confidential knowledge,
but you can understand because you are my devotee and friend.
So, devotion to Krishna in a transcendental relationship,
is an important qualification to access that confidential knowledge.
Later on, in the ninth chapter, Krishna says,
There also he says, this is very confidential knowledge,
but Arjuna, you can understand because you are not envious of me.
So, being a devotee in a transcendental relationship
and not being envious of Krishna,
these are the qualifications one must have
in order to access the confidential knowledge of the Bhagavad Gita.
